CWEs: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
description: The function unique_name_224 is vulnerable to OS command injection. The function constructs a command to be executed using the 'execCommand' function. The command includes user-supplied input (ap.ssid and config.iface) without proper sanitization or validation. An attacker could potentially inject malicious commands by providing specially crafted input.
